articles.description: Generic ketamine has the power to slash the overall cost of treating clinical depression by more than 60 percent.
articles.content:
Image credits: julien Tromeur/Unsplash
We have previously reported numerous studies that demonstrate ketamines remarkable ability to treat even the most stubborn cases of clinical depression. Ketami… [+4339 chars]
